Title: Freeguild General on Warhorse
Intro: A Freeguild General on Warhorse is armed with one of the following weapon options: Sigmarite Weapon and Freeguild Shield; Sigmarite Weapon and Pistol; Sigmarite Weapon and Stately War Banner; or Freeguild Lance and Freeguild Shield.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Warhorse attacks with its Steel-shod Hooves.

Rules.Name: Stately War Banner
Rules.Rule: STATELY WAR BANNER: If this unit is armed with a Stately War Banner, it gains the TOTEM keyword.

Rules.Name: Charging Lance
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES This unit’s Freeguild Lance has a Rend characteristic of -2 instead of -1 if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.

Rules.Name: Hold The Line
Rules.Rule: Hold the Line: You can use this command ability in your hero phase. This unit must issue the command and up to 3 friendly FREEGUILD units can receive the command. Until the start of your next hero phase, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made by the units that received the command if they have not made a normal move, run, retreat or charge move in the same turn.
